name: Trail Light
description:
Trail Light is a learn as you go, adventure puzzle game. The evolution of single line fill style puzzles with enough mechanics to keep 100 hand-crafted levels interesting throughout.

How to Play
Fill in all the tiles with the correct color, and advance to the goal on levels that have a goal.

Controls:

WASD for movement

E to undo 

R to restart a level

ESC to open the pause menu
